abstract: The billionaire investor Carl C. Icahn has reduced his stake in Blockbuster, selling more than 13 million shares of the troubled video rental chain, which possibly faces bankruptcy.
snippet: The billionaire investor Carl C. Icahn has reduced his stake in Blockbuster, selling more than 13 million shares of the troubled video rental chain, which possibly faces bankruptcy.
lead_paragraph: The billionaire investor Carl C. Icahn has reduced his stake in Blockbuster, selling more than 13 million shares of the troubled video rental chain, which possibly faces bankruptcy, Reuters reports.

headline.main: Icahn Trims His Stake in Troubled Blockbuster
